title: Shoreless
features: Winner of the 2019 Lexi Rudnitsky Editor’s Choice Award, this sensuous collection bravely endeavors to share the wisdom age confers.

, her fifth collection of poetry, Enid Shomer continues to explore her passionate relationship with the Florida landscape, the inextricable web of family, and the challenges of the body. While studded with the austere recognitions of growing older, these poems are punctuated by humor and play―formally elegant and inventive, beautifully textured and nuanced. Throughout the book, Shomer employs the  language of science and Eros to uncover the exquisite truths of pain and pleasure.
description: is the author of five acclaimed books of poetry and three of fiction. She is also the editor of an anthology,
All We Know of Pleasure: Poetic Erotica by Women
. Her writing has appeared in the
, and elsewhere.  She lives in Tampa.
